doc.title: Cluedo
doc.plot: "The Hooded Madonna" Mr Boddy never believed in this painting's curse! Of course, now he is dead he may have more time to reconsider it. "Happy Ever After" Mr Boddy plans to get married. Someone however would rather see him six feet under! "Deadly Patent" Rubbies are said to be lucky... not for the late Mr Boddy it would seem! "Blackmail" The collapse of a brewery deal proves to be fatal! "The Road To Damascus" Mr. Boddy claimed to have "seen the light", but somebody helped him meet his reward sooner than expected! "Not In My Backyard" Mr Boddy decides to sell Arlington Hall to a strange freedom cult. A decision that proves to be fatal!
